Room.Name: Ettercap Nest
Room.ShortDescription: You are high above the jungle floor in a filthy, foul Ettercap nest.
Room.LongDescription: The ettercaps are nasty creatures with pot-bellies, long arms, and razor sharp claws. Their bodies are covered with tufts of thick, wirey black hair. They have long, hypodermic like fangs, and can inject a fast acting toxin capable of death in an instant. Like spiders, they can spin silk strands to make elaborate traps. There are several skeletons here, their flesh long ago sucked dry.
